response.overview: El Mariachi plunges headfirst into the dark border underworld when he follows a trail of blood to the last of the infamous Mexican drug lords, Bucho, for an action-packed, bullet-riddled showdown. With the help of his friend and a beautiful bookstore owner, El Mariachi tracks Bucho, takes on his army of desperados, and leaves his own trail of blood.
response.tagline: He came back to settle the score with someone. Anyone. EVERYONE.
response.title: Desperado

cast.name: Reinol Martinez
cast.character: Guy Scolding Niño Outside Tarasco Bar (uncredited)
